Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The frequencies with which we detected mutations were 5 ( 14 % ) of 35 in sporadic cases and 8 ( 80 % ) of 10 in familial cases . .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Sporadic cases |
| Familial cases |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases, but rather describes two types of cases (sporadic and familial) in which mutations were detected. Therefore, the entities identified are the types of cases themselves.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases associated with these cases. Therefore, the entities identified are the types of cases themselves, which do not clearly refer to diseases. However, it's important to note that the context of the paragraph suggests that the cases may be related to certain diseases, but the paragraph itself does not provide enough information to identify specific diseases.
